column1: Kata Robata////I've been here way too many times. Every time I come here w a friend
column2: all the dishes are great. I love the lobster and truffle Mac n cheese
column3: even though I don't eat Mac n cheese
column4: it's one of my favorite dishes. The cold noodles and duck breast is so delicious! My favorite cocktail from here is 99 problems... it's great if you like bourbon! Sunrise rolls are to die for.
